# Read the App Store Review Details of an App Clip

**Web Service Endpoint**

Get App Store Review details for an App Clip.

## Managing App Review Details for Your App Clip

- **Create App Store Review Details for an App Clip**: Provide App Clip metadata required by App Store Review.
- **Modify App Store Review Details for an App Clip**: Update App Clip metadata you provide to App Store Review.
